title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2010)
creator_credit: Annie Bolitho, Cameron Sugden, Jane Curtis, Susan Dirgham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: These four personal narratives cover vastly different lives but the prevailing theme is of family and the parental figure that inspires and protects. Created as part of an ACMI Digital Storytelling Program in the Digital Studio or outreach program.
creator_credit_for_label: Annie Bolitho, Cameron Sugden, Jane Curtis, Susan Dirgham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
